titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on 2,7-Naphthalenedisulfonic acid, 5-YY4-chloro-6-YY2-YY4-chloro-6-YY7-YY4-(ethenylsulfonyl)phe yl?azo?-8-hydroxy-3,6-disulfo-1-naphthalenyl?amino?-1,3,5-tr azin-2-yl?amino?ethyl?(2-hydroxyethyl)amino?-1,3,5-triazin-2 yl?amino?-3-YY4-(ethenylsulfonyl)phenyl?azo?-4-hydroxy-,sodi m salt.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary:
1/15/2008--Introduced.
Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on 2,7-Naphthalenedisulfonic acid, 5-YY4-chloro-6-YY2-YY4-chloro-6-YY7-YY4-(ethenylsulfonyl)phe yl?azo?-8-hydroxy-3,6-disulfo-1-naphthalenyl?amino?-1,3,5-tr azin-2-yl?amino?ethyl?(2-hydroxyethyl)amino?-1,3,5-triazin-2 yl?amino?-3-YY4-(ethenylsulfonyl)phenyl?azo?-4-hydroxy-,sodi m salt.
